attributes.action: Open up sure start centres so that young children can socialise again
attributes.background: With yourh centres re-opening and government guidelines for Medway specifically saying children’s groups are allowed please re-open our sure start centre groups! Lots of us mother’s, father’s etc rely on those groups to offer social interaction for our children and ourselves without financial burden

rejection.details:
Since 1 June, early years settings have been able to welcome back children of all ages. Deciding whether and how to reopen Sure Start centres is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

If Sure Start centres in your area have not reopened, you should contact your local authority about this.
